stories.title: View Registration Form
stories.description: As a user, I want to view the registration form so that I can fill in my details.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the form is loaded, When I open the registration page, Then all fields such as First Name, Last Name, Email, Age, Salary, and Department should be visible.

stories.title: Enter First Name
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my first name so that it is included in my profile.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the first name field is visible, When I type my first name, Then it should be displayed in the field.

stories.title: Enter Last Name
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my last name so that it is included in my profile.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the last name field is visible, When I type my last name, Then it should be displayed in the field.

stories.title: Enter Email
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my email address so that I can receive notifications.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the email field is visible, When I type my email in a valid format, Then it should be displayed in the field.

stories.title: Enter Age
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my age so that my profile has complete personal information.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the age field is visible, When I type my age, Then it should be displayed in the field.

stories.title: Enter Salary
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my salary so that my financial information is recorded.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the salary field is visible, When I type my salary, Then it should be displayed in the field.

stories.title: Enter Department
stories.description: As a user, I want to enter my department so that my organizational details are complete.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the department field is visible, When I type my department, Then it should be displayed in the field.

stories.title: Submit Registration Form
stories.description: As a user, I want to submit the registration form so that my information is recorded.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given all fields are filled, When I click the submit button, Then the form should be submitted successfully.
